name: Video Softphone
short_description: Our Video and IM softphone is developed with the capability to not only attuned with the present VoIP technology but handle all the future developments as well. This software is fully tested for the compatibility by our industry expert testing team and qualified for being robust and efficient Softphone that match up with the global VoIP standards and got outstanding reviews for being an excellent video conference softphone. It is highly interoperable with all the standard platform and devices of VoIP industry. The advanced features that come up with this Softphone application has set a benchmark in the VoIP industry and get you such unified communication experience that you never had before.
summary: Video Conference Software | Video Communication Systems | Video Confer
